update tb_spu_detail
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spec_template = #{specTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
packing_list = #{packingList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
after_service = #{afterService,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_spu_detail set description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec_template = #{specTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, packing_list = #{packingList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, after_service = #{afterService,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
